enum.name: TransferType
enum.description: Method used to transfer charging data

enumMember.name: ftp-pull
enumMember.description: Charging data transfer uses FTP pull only

enumMember.name: gtp-prime
enumMember.description: Charging data transfer uses GTP Prime only

enumMember.name: gtpp-ftp
enumMember.description: Charging data transfer uses both FTP pull and GTP Prime

derivedDataType.name: VolumeLimit
derivedDataType.description: Volume of charging data to buffer

derivedDataType.name: SingletonNodeName
derivedDataType.description: Type of single node name, has to be equal to 1

derivedDataType.name: SgsnChangeLimit
derivedDataType.description: Maximum number of SGSN changes before generating partial CDR

derivedDataType.name: EcimEmpty
derivedDataType.description: The empty built-in type represents a leaf that does not have any value, it conveys information by its presence or absence.

derivedDataType.name: ChangeLimit
derivedDataType.description: Maximum record changes to buffer on PIC

attribute.name: characteristicsID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: default
attribute.description: Profile applied to context if context contains no charging characteristic

attribute.name: timeLimit
attribute.description: Limit of number of minutes for generating partial CDR

attribute.name: sgsnChangeLimit
attribute.description: Limit of number of SGSN changes for generating partial CDR

attribute.name: changeLimit
attribute.description: Limit of number of condition changes for generating partial CDR

attribute.name: volumeLimit
attribute.description: Limit of number of kilobytes for generating partial CDR

attribute.name: profile0ID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: noCallDetail
attribute.description: Do not generate call data records

attribute.description: Method used to transfer charging data

class.name: GtpPrime
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='exists(/ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/Cpb/@gomAddressRange)'><name path='.'/>: cpb gomAddressRange must be configured</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: gtpPrimeID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: gateway
attribute.description: Address of billing gateway

attribute.name: timeLimit
attribute.description: Limit of number of minutes for generating partial CDR

attribute.name: sgsnChangeLimit
attribute.description: Limit of number of SGSN changes for generating partial CDR

attribute.name: changeLimit
attribute.description: Limit of number of condition changes for generating partial CDR

attribute.name: volumeLimit
attribute.description: Limit of number of kilobytes for generating partial CDR

attribute.name: profile6ID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: noCallDetail
attribute.description: Do not generate call data records

attribute.name: transferType
attribute.description: Method used to transfer charging data

attribute.name: timeLimit
attribute.description: Limit of number of minutes for generating partial CDR

attribute.name: sgsnChangeLimit
attribute.description: Limit of number of SGSN changes for generating partial CDR

attribute.name: changeLimit

attribute.name: volumeLimit

attribute.name: profile15ID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: noCallDetail
attribute.description: Do not generate call data records

attribute.name: transferType
attribute.description: Method used to transfer charging data

attribute.name: serviceDataID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: uriLimit
attribute.description: Limit of number of URIs for generating partial CDR

attribute.name: chargeEventLimit
attribute.description: Limit of number of charged events for generating partial CDR
